meanings.sent1: The farmer bought some feedstuff for his cows.
meanings.sent2: The feedstuff was stored in the barn for the animals.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken bring a suitcase full of feedstuff to the party?
meanings.sent4: The fields were a buffet of feedstuff for the hungry cattle.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh feedstuff filled the air on the farm.

meanings.sent1: The feedstuff was delivered to the farm in large bags.
meanings.sent2: Farmers carefully select the best feedstuff for their animals.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to hide the feedstuff in its cheeks like acorns.
meanings.sent4: The feedstuff acted as a lifeline for the starving livestock.
meanings.sent5: The quality of the feedstuff directly impacts the health of the animals.
